description:
Re-assign the keys of your keyboard, mouse or desktop set individually with the new CHERRY KEYS software.

CHERRY KEYS is the intuitive solution for keyboards and mice. CHERRY KEYS works with almost all keyboards and mice â€“ regardless of manufacturer. However, due to the special keys that are often specific to certain keyboards, it works best with original CHERRY products. The software runs in the background and modifies the incoming signals from the input devices according to your wishes.
